The Macro Files¶

IMPORTANT: Do not edit these files unless you have a very good reason to. Edits may cause unexpected errors in the execution of the model.

Macros are accessed by clicking on the Visual Basic module in the Developer tab. This tab may not be available in your Excel, and you will have to activate it. You can do so by following this Link.

The ‘individual country macro’ can be accessed by double clicking on Module5, it is called “current_single_country_macro()”. The ‘all country macro’ can be accessed by double clicking on Module6, it is called “current_all_countries_macro()”
